秘密会議: (ひみつかいぎ) - secret meeting or conference
秘密保持契約: (ひみつほじけいやく) - non-disclosure agreement; NDA
秘密基地: (ひみつきち) - secret base; hideout; hidden position
秘密度表示: (ひみつどひょうじ) - sensitivity indication
秘密情報: (ひみつじょうほう) - confidential information
秘密投票: (ひみつとうひょう) - secret vote; secret ballot
秘密文書: (ひみつぶんしょ) - confidential document; confidential paper; classified document
秘密漏洩: (ひみつろうせつ) - leaking of a secret; leakage of a secret
秘密漏洩罪: (ひみつろうせつざい) - (crime of) revealing state secrets; charge of revealing national security information
秘密漏示罪: (ひみつろうじざい) - the crime of revealing a secret; breach of confidence
秘密裏: (ひみつり) - behind closed doors; behind-the-scenes; (under the veil of) secrecy
秘密裡: (ひみつり) - behind closed doors; behind-the-scenes; (under the veil of) secrecy
秘密証書遺言: (ひみつしょうしょゆいごん) - secret will and testament (sealed envelope will)
秘密録音: (ひみつろくおん) - recording audio without consent; secret recording
秘密鍵: (ひみつかぎ) - private key; secret key
秘密鍵暗号方式: (ひみつかぎあんごうほうしき) - secret key cryptosystem
秘所: (ひしょ) - secret or hidden place; (euph. for) woman's genitalia; the underworld/the other world
秘文: (ひぶん) - password; secret spell; secret phrase
秘方: (ひほう) - secret method; secret recipe; (prescription for a) secret medicine
秘書技能検定: (ひしょぎのうけんてい) - official test for a secretarial qualification
秘書検定: (ひしょけんてい) - official test for a secretarial qualification
秘本: (ひほん) - treasured book; secret book; pornographic book
秘決: (ひけつ) - secret (method, trick, etc.); mysteries (of an art, trade, etc.); key (e.g. to success); recipe
秘湯: (ひとう) - little-known hot spring; secret hot spring; secluded hot spring
秘苑: (ひえん) - secret garden/private garden; name for female genitalia
秘術: (ひじゅつ) - secret art; the mysteries
秘訣: (ひけつ) - secret (method, trick, etc.); mysteries (of an art, trade, etc.); key (e.g. to success); recipe
租庸調: (そようちょう) - corvee; taxes in kind or service (former tax system)
租税の帰着: (そぜいのきちゃく) - incidence of taxation; tax incidence
租税転嫁: (そぜいてんか) - shifting of tax; tax shifting
秤: (しょう) - Balanças, balanças de precisão, balança de pesagem
秤にかける: (はかりにかける) - to weigh on a scale; to weigh up options/to compare pros and cons
秤動: (ひょうどう) - oscillation of a heavenly body; libration
秤量: (しょうりょう) - measuring weight/weighing; (ひょうりょう only) maximum weight (on a scales)
秦: (しん) - Manchu Dynasty , Qin dynasty (China, 221-207 a.C.), Ch'in dynasty
秧鶏: (クイナ) - rail (any bird of family Rallidae, esp. the water rail, Rallus aquaticus)
秩序整然: (ちつじょせいぜん) - (yoji) in good (perfect) order; in apple-pie order
秩序正しい: (ちつじょただしい) - orderly; well-ordered
秩序立つ: (ちつじょだつ) - to be in order; to be organized; to be systematized
秩序立てる: (ちつじょだてる) - to put in order; to organize; to systematize
秩序維持: (ちつじょいじ) - maintaining order (e.g. in a courtroom)
秩父三十三所: (ちちぶさんじゅうさんしょ) - 34 (originally 33) sacred places in and around Chichibu, Saitama Prefecture
秩父蝙蝠: (チチブコウモリ) - Asian barbastelle (Barbastella leucomelas); eastern barbastelle
称える: (たたえる) - to extol; to give praise
称す: (しょうす) - to take the name of/to call oneself; to pretend/to feign/to purport
称する: (しょうする) - to take the name of/to call oneself; to pretend/to feign/to purport
称める: (ほめる) - to praise; to admire; to speak well
称名: (しょうみょう) - intoning the name of the Buddha; chanting the name of the Buddha
称揚: (しょうよう) - praise; admiration; exalting; extolling
称美: (しょうび) - admiration; praise; prizing; appreciation
称讃: (しょうさん) - praise; admiration; commendation; approbation
